name: Make digital worksheets
description: Did you ever wish you could add a video to a worksheet, or a quiz? Even an interactive map, or a simulation? Digital worksheets can do this.

name: Easy to learn
description: Start simple by writing text, like a paper worksheet. Later, you can add images and even videos. Better still: You can add interactive widgets. Everything at your pace.

name: What you see is what you get
description: WebWriter's interface is simple to use. Like an Office app, you work directly on the explorable and always see what your student will see.

name: Run it on any platform
description: You can install WebWriter on any Windows/Mac/Linux computer. Likewise, your students can use your explorables on any device.

name: Publish any way you want
description: Explorables are files. Store them in the cloud or put them on a USB drive. Explorables are also websites! Host them online so anyone can access them with a link, for example in a learning management system like Moodle.
